column4: is there away to get a gigabyte pci wireless card working with ndiswrapper?
something like broadcom, atheros, realtek, etc
could you please open a terminal and type lspci and see what that reports ( the single line not the whole thing) thanks
does ifconfig (in the terminal) show two entries eth0 lo, or a third as well like ra0 rausb0 or wlan0
you have a wifi spot to test it on?
does sudo dhclient wlan0 (or interface name) give you a dhcpoffer?
